message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I know it's a valuable asset, and I'm confident it will bring you significant benefit. I'm offering it to you for $13,000. This price reflects the quality and potential of the product. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $10,000 is significantly lower than the value this product holds. To reflect both our needs, I'm willing to lower my price to $12,000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price.

Bob,  I appreciate your effort to meet me halfway.  While I'm willing to compromise, $11,000 simply doesn't reflect the real value of this product.  To show my willingness to reach a deal, I'm willing to go down to $11,500.  This is a fair price, and it allows for a mutually beneficial outcome.  Let's work together to find a solution that benefits both of us.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to make one more compromise to reach a deal.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,800 is still a bit too low for me.  To make a final attempt at a deal, I'm willing to drop to $11,200.  This price recognizes your needs while still reflecting the product's worth.  If this doesn't work, I'll need to explore other options.  Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to make one more compromise to reach a deal.
